Description: Spatial biology opens the door to deep dive into your sample, no matter what fixed tissue or cells you are analysing. Reach the next level of characterization and analysis of your tumor microenvironment with our spatial biology solution, the MACSima™ Platform. With the launch of RNAsky, our cutting-edge technology becomes a multiomics platform. Explore high-plex proteomics seamlessly combined with RNA on the same section and get to explore and see more than ever before. Join our Spotlight Theater and discover how the single cell spatial revolution helped to decipher cell-cell interactions in the metastatic liver with the MACSima Platform.
Location: Spotlight Theater B - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
SearchResultBody: ESP7B. Same-section Multiomics with MACSima™ Platform - Diving into Spatial Biology to Advance Cancer Therapy
SearchResultFooter: Spotlight Theater B - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
Title: Same-section Multiomics with MACSima™ Platform - Diving into Spatial Biology to Advance Cancer Therapy
